DOC.brief_summary: The actual study should provide a first direct comparison between results after reconstruction of sensory nerves of the hand using muscle-in-vein conduits to the standard methods of nerve transplantation and direct nerve suture.
DOC.brief_title: Muscle-in-vein Conduits for Digital Nerve Reconstruction
DOC.criteria: complete digital nerve injuries, nerve reconstruction in the first 6 months post trauma total or subtotal amputations
